notes: Major Japanese publisher. Uses embed#### naming with _HD suffix for high-quality images. Kuchie extracted from spine (p-cover, p-fmatter).

exclude.notes: Exclude publisher logo/gaiji/promo assets from extraction and chapter markdown.

cover.notes: Cover typically embed0016_HD.jpg, extracted from p-cover.xhtml

kuchie.notes: Kuchie (color plates) typically embed0000-0004_HD.jpg or image1-image7 variants, found in p-cover/p-fmatter/pre-content spine entries. System extracts and renames to kuchie-###.jpg

illustrations.notes: HD variants (_HD suffix) for high quality, standard (no suffix) for lower resolution. Includes image8+ variant used for chapter inline illustrations.

content_structure.notes: Uses p-### naming. Kuchie in dedicated p-cover.xhtml and p-fmatter-###.xhtml spine entries (NOT in Images/ folder directly)

test_cases.title: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について (1)
test_cases.notes: embed0000-0004_HD.jpg + embed0016_HD.jpg as kuchie. embed0006-0015 as illustrations. Kuchie in spine entries, not Image/ folder pattern matching.

test_cases.title: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について (5)
test_cases.notes: Shueisha imageN naming variant: cover.jpg + image1-image7 pre-content kuchie, image8-image15 chapter illustrations, gaiji0.png/dx_logo.png excluded.
